PERRLA is the industry-leading software for writing APA & MLA papers. We’ve helped countless students reduce their anxiety and get their best grade on papers since 1998. When you need us, we’re here for you - until 10 pm, 7 days a week!

PERRLA’s new browser extension for Google Chrome & Microsoft Edge allows you to create new references while you do your online research, access your full PERRLA Reference Library, and generate perfectly formatted citations & references.

The PERRLA extension is part of the PERRLA ecosystem that includes our web-based paper creation software (PERRLA Online) and a native Microsoft Word Add-in (PERRLA for Word). Start your free trial of PERRLA or learn more at www.perrla.com.

Some of our best features:

* Generate new references for all APA & MLA reference types
* Search for a reference’s bibliographic information using the webpage you’re currently viewing
* Access your full PERRLA Reference Library at any time
* Create perfectly formatted references & citations, then copy them to your clipboard
* Ridiculously good Customer Support

If you ever have a question or run into trouble, you can reach out to our US-based Customer Support Team. We’re available until 10 pm, 7 days a week. Reach us via email at support@perrla.com and we’ll get back to you quickly.
